outputs.output_descr: The project trains staff in the Office of the President to render efficient and effective service in delivering its mandate. It provides support to free and fair election based on international standards provided.
The Office of the President is enhanced to implement the Policy Framework

project_descr: Build the capacity of the Office of the President of the Government of Southern Sudan to play a key role in supporting the President to provide strong leadership to the country, and contributing to democratic development and sustainable peace.
project_title: Support to GOSS Presidency - Phase II
